# {msm.stacked}

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The {msm.stacked} can be used to simplify the creation of stacked probabilities plot from multistate model fits from the [{msm}](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=msm) package.

# Installation

You can install the development version of {msm.stacked} from [GitHub](https://github.com) with:

```r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("RedDoorAnalytics/msm.stacked")
```
